meta.title: Documentations and Changelogs
meta.description: Documentations and changelogs of the programs.

block.text: These documentations are to provide you with help and support on the usage of the programs. They should also give answers on possible questions. If you can't find an answer to your question here, don't hesitate to write me an e-mail. Simply use the e-mail address available on the
The following program documentations are available:
Changelogs or versions histories document changes and improvements to all versions of a programm. They are quite useful to answer questions like "What's new".
